title: Ep. 12 - The Pitchfork Mob Comes For Starbucks
description:
The racism claims against Starbucks are not supported by the facts. Call me crazy, but I think a private company ought to have the right to enforce its rules against loitering and trespassing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
